typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpSource
source(output(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
EmpSource, Department join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmpJoinDepartment
EmpJoinDepartment sink(partitionFileNames:['empdep.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		DepID,
		DeptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
